argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fprodsplit1.a | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | fprodsplit1.b | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | fprodsplit1.c | |- ( ph -> C e. A ) |
| 4 |  | fprodsplit1.d | |- ( ( ph /\ k = C ) -> B = D ) |
| 5 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ k ph |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcvd | |- ( ph -> F/_ k D ) |
| 7 | 5, 6, 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_fprodsplit1f | |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B = ( D x. prod_ k e. ( A \ { C } ) B ) ) |
